name: Com2Net
short_description: Com2Net, a customized release of X-Mode 2.0a2 (Yotsuba) only fully integrated with Monde 2.0b1 and the last package from X-Mode Project released in PHP. Licensed under GNU GPL. See more at http://x-mode.shiroyuki.com.
